title: China today. No. 804
creator_contributor_role: Film Studio of the Peoples Republic of China, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/China - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/China - Description and travel
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Botanical gardens
description: Birthday banquet for old friend Dutch filmmaker John Ibens celebrates his 81st birthday through the Chinese Ministry Culture. "Ping Pong at the seashore" A training seminar for up coming ping-pong championships. "New job opportunities for urban youth" 1200 workers have been employed at the news sheet factory in Shanghai. "New method for processing metals" A new way of processing metals through controlled explosion. "Lashau Botanical Garden" A garden laboratory that looks at the study of new plant life and the domestication of wild plants. More than 3400 plants are cultivated at the Lashau garden.
